name: Metropolis (itch) (hexyuu)
description:
Metropolis is an environmentally conscious city building game, where you must expand your city while keeping in line with emission requirements and keeping the population happy.

How to play Metropolis:

1. Complete tasks for citizens.

2. Expand your city as you wish, aiming to increase the population.

3. Fulfill citizens' requests, for example, building a school.

4. Be conscious of your environmental impact while expanding your city.
